label: SharePointSensitivityLabelInfo
description: Information about the sensitivity label applied to a SharePoint document.

fields.label: Display Name
fields.tooltip: The display name for the sensitivity label.

fields.label: Sensitivity Label ID
fields.tooltip: The ID of the sensitivity label.

fields.label: Priority
fields.tooltip: The priority in which the sensitivity label is applied.

fields.label: Color
fields.tooltip: The color that the UI should display for the label, if configured.

fields.label: Tooltip
fields.tooltip: The tooltip that should be displayed for the label in a UI.

fields.label: Is Encrypted
fields.tooltip: Indicates whether the sensitivity label enforces encryption.
